movies.title: Banshee!!!
movies.plot: A group of college friends on a spring break camping trip are stalked and slashed by an unknown creature with the ability to make them hallucinate through sound waves. The survivors hold up refuge in an isolated farmhouse, cut off from all communication. Now, they have to come up with a plan to kill this unrelenting creature before it kills them. "Banshee!!!" takes the idea of the legendary Irish myth and spins it around into a terrifying and unstoppable monster!
movies.simplePlot: A group of college friends on a spring break camping trip are stalked and slashed by an unknown creature with the ability to make them hallucinate through sound waves.

biography.bio: Ashley was born on August 25th, 1984 in Summit, New Jersey. Most of Ashley's childhood was spent in Southern Connecticut with her parents and younger sister, Alexis. After graduating from High School, Ashley attended Syracuse University and studied Communications and Rhetorical Studies, as well as English Textual Studies. Upon her graduation (May 2006), she moved to Atlanta, Georgia and worked in Public Relations. Ashley now resides in New York City and Connecticut and is pursuing her acting career.
biography.name: Ashley Bates

biography.bio: David McCarthy was born on July 30, 1982 in Derby, Connecticut, USA. He is known for his work on Banshee!!! (2008), Camp Hell (2010) and Friends (With Benefits) (2009).
biography.name: David McCarthy

biography.bio: Kevin Shea is an actor and producer, known for Assault of the Sasquatch (2009), Remains (2011) and Going Home (2011).
biography.name: Kevin Shea

biography.bio: Kerry McGann leading role in the cult classic horror film, Banshee!!! (2008) made it the top 5 most watched movie on the Chiller Network and has been cast in the role of Maggie in the play Crazy Horse written by Vincent Pastore and directed by Maureen Van Zandt for the Renegade Theatre Group. Kerry McGann was born in Totowa, N.J. to an Irish immigrant mother and an American born war veteran. Kerry started her career as a young print model being photographed by world renowned high fashion photographers such as Hiro and Francesco Scavullo and in advertisements for JCPenny, New York Times Magazine, as well as, being featured in Premier Magazine. Following in her first cousin's, Brooke Shields, footsteps Kerry began acting in community theatre and local commercials which lead her to auditioning for the esteemed BFA program at the University of Southern California (USC) and becoming one of only two transfer students accepted that year into their acting program. On returning to the East Coast, Kerry took a job as a commercial copywriter while debuting in her first Off-Broadway play, The Fourth Chair at the Intar Theater. During this time, Kerry, also became a member of the Love Creek Theatre Group and performed in several of their original play productions, as well as, directed. Setting her sights on film, Kerry, was first cast in a lead role in the feature film, Exposure (2007), and immediately went on to star in such cult classic movies such as: Banshee!!! (2008), _"Dark Haul"(2014)_, Assault of the Sasquatch (2009), Wishin' and Hopin' (2014) and the soon to be released feature film, Bloodrunners (2017), to name a few. Along with her successful film career, Kerry, is also an active member of the Renegade Theatre Company founded by Maureen Van Zandt, Vincent Pastore, and Steven Van Zandt and has been cast in the role of Maggie in their production of Crazy Horse. Aside for her busy acting career, Kerry McGann, has now stepped into the role of producer for several upcoming feature films.
biography.name: Kerry McGann

biography.bio: Iris McQuillan-Grace was born on August 18, 1983 in Westport, Connecticut, USA. She is an actress, known for Tough Crowd (2008), The Cape (2009) and Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Iris McQuillan-Grace

biography.bio: Troy Walcott was born and raised in Hartford, Connecticut. Troy graduated from the University of Connecticut in 2002 with a degree in Communications Sciences. Troy began entertaining when he won a contest sponsored by UCTV, (UConn Student Television) the local campus network, and ultimately hosted the popular campus TV show "Holla @ Me!" for 2 1/2 years. Troy is a versatile and charismatic actor who works with developmentally delayed teenagers while acting both on stage and in film.
biography.name: Troy Walcott

biography.bio: A. Mike Forgette was born on May 3, 1985 in Dover, Delaware, USA as Anthony Michael Forgette. He is an actor, known for Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: A. Mike Forgette

biography.bio: Leo Petry is an actor and writer, known for Mask Face (2011), The Wolf (2016) and Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Leo Petry

biography.bio: Greg Nutcher was born on May 5, 1969 in New Haven, Connecticut, USA. He is known for his work on Bridge of Spies (2015), Grandpa's Psycho (2015) and Dark Haul (2014).
biography.name: Greg Nutcher

biography.bio: Ken LaMothe is an actor, known for Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Ken LaMothe

biography.bio: Cristina Santiago was born in Hartford, Connecticut, USA. She is an actress, known for Assault of the Sasquatch (2009), Remains (2011) and Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Cristina Santiago

biography.bio: John Doolan was born on July 17, 1984 in Waterbury, Connecticut, USA. He is known for his work on Remains (2011), Wishin' and Hopin' (2014) and Deep in the Darkness (2014).
biography.name: John Doolan

biography.bio: Nathan Pupillo is an actor, known for Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Nathan Pupillo

biography.bio: Buxom, sexy, and shapely 5'3" blonde bombshell Jess Wakefield was born on July 27, 1981 in Clearwater, Florida. The striking blue-eyed beauty has been modeling since childhood. Jess has been featured in such magazines as "Steppin' Out," "Easy Rider," "RockStar," "Club International," and "Northwest Rider." Moreover, Wakefield has appeared on "The Howard Stern Show." Jess not only has acted in a few explicit adult movies, but also had a small, yet memorable role as a beautiful hitchhiker in the low-budget horror monster picture "Banshee!!!". She maintains her remarkably tight and toned figure by working out four days a week two hours per day. Wakefield owns a Rottweiler named Dante and two cats named Precious and Annabella. Jess lives in Connecticutt.
biography.name: Jess Wakefield

biography.bio: Jesse Murphy is an actor, known for Victimized (2014), Pickman's Model (2008) and Banshee!!! (2008).
biography.name: Jesse Murphy
